verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3947><s%> "Take a large <S%H1419><s%> tablet, <S%H1549><s%> and write <S%H3789><s%> on it with a man <S%H582><s%>'s pen, <S%H2747><s%> <S%H4122><s%> 'For Maher Shalal Hash Baz;'

and I will take <S%H5749><s%> for myself faithful <S%H539><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> to testify: <S%H5749><s%> Uriah <S%H223><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeberechiah. <S%H3000><s%>"

I went <S%H7126><s%> to the prophetess, <S%H5031><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son. <S%H1121><s%> Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7121><s%> "Call his name <S%H8034><s%> <S%H4122><s%> 'Maher Shalal Hash Baz.'

For before the child <S%H5288><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> how to say, <S%H7121><s%> <S%H1><s%> 'My father,' and, <S%H517><s%> 'My mother,' the riches <S%H2428><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> will be carried away <S%H5375><s%> by <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria. <S%H804><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me yet again, <S%H3254><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> have refused <S%H3988><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Shiloah <S%H7975><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> softly, <S%H328><s%> and rejoice <S%H4885><s%> in Rezin <S%H7526><s%> and Remaliah <S%H7425><s%>'s son; <S%H1121><s%>

now therefore, <S%H136><s%> behold, the Lord brings upon <S%H5927><s%> them the mighty <S%H6099><s%> flood <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> of the River: <S%H5104><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> and all his glory. <S%H3519><s%> It will come up <S%H5927><s%> over all its channels, <S%H650><s%> and go over <S%H1980><s%> all its banks. <S%H1415><s%>

It will sweep <S%H2498><s%> onward into Judah. <S%H3063><s%> It will overflow <S%H7857><s%> and pass through; <S%H5674><s%> it will reach <S%H5060><s%> even to the neck; <S%H6677><s%> and the stretching out <S%H4298><s%> of its wings <S%H3671><s%> will fill <S%H4393><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> Immanuel. <S%H6005><s%>

Make an uproar, <S%H7489><s%> you peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and be broken in pieces! <S%H2865><s%> Listen, <S%H238><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you from far <S%H4801><s%> countries: <S%H776><s%> dress <S%H247><s%> for battle, <S%H2865><s%> and be shattered! Dress <S%H247><s%> for battle, <S%H2865><s%> and be shattered!

Take <S%H5779><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> together, <S%H5779><s%> and it will be brought to nothing; <S%H6565><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> and it will not stand: <S%H6965><s%> for God is with us. <S%H410><s%>"

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> thus to me with a strong <S%H2393><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and instructed <S%H3256><s%> me not to walk <S%H3212><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of this people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Don't <S%H559><s%> say, <S%H7195><s%> 'A conspiracy!' concerning all about which this people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7195><s%> 'A conspiracy!' neither fear <S%H3372><s%> their threats, <S%H4172><s%> nor be terrorized. <S%H6206><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is who you must respect <S%H6942><s%> as holy. <S%H4172><s%> He is the one you must fear. He is the one you must dread. <S%H6206><s%>

He will be a sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> but for <S%H68><s%> <S%H6697><s%> <S%H4383><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> he will be a trap <S%H6341><s%> and a snare <S%H4170><s%> for the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> will stumble <S%H3782><s%> over it, <S%H5307><s%> fall, be broken, <S%H7665><s%> be snared, <S%H3369><s%> and be captured. <S%H3920><s%>"
Wrap up <S%H6887><s%> the testimony. <S%H8584><s%> Seal <S%H2856><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> among my disciples. <S%H3928><s%>
I will wait <S%H2442><s%> for Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who hides <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and I will look for him. <S%H6960><s%>

Behold, <S%H3206><s%> I and the children whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me are for signs <S%H226><s%> and for wonders <S%H4159><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> who dwells <S%H7931><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

When they tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H1875><s%> "Consult with those who have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%> and with the wizards, <S%H3049><s%> who chirp <S%H6850><s%> and who mutter: <S%H1897><s%>" shouldn't <S%H5971><s%> a people consult <S%H1875><s%> with their God? <S%H430><s%> Should they consult the dead <S%H4191><s%> on behalf of the living? <S%H2416><s%>
Turn to the law <S%H8451><s%> and to the testimony! <S%H8584><s%> If they don't <S%H559><s%> speak according to this word, <S%H1697><s%> surely there is no morning for them. <S%H7837><s%>

They will pass <S%H5674><s%> through it, <S%H7185><s%> very distressed and hungry; <S%H7457><s%> and it will happen that when they are hungry, <S%H7456><s%> they will worry, <S%H7107><s%> and curse <S%H7043><s%> by their king <S%H4428><s%> and by their God. <S%H430><s%> They will turn <S%H6437><s%> their faces upward, <S%H4605><s%>

and look <S%H5027><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and see distress, <S%H6869><s%> darkness, <S%H2825><s%> and the gloom <S%H4588><s%> of anguish. <S%H6695><s%> They will be driven <S%H5080><s%> into thick darkness. <S%H653><s%>
